config.timestamp.column.name: MODIFIEDTS
config.query: SELECT p.CODE, p.P_GALLERYIMAGES, CAST(p.P_APPROVALSTATUS AS NUMBER(13)) AS P_APPROVALSTATUS, p.MODIFIEDTS FROM HARP.PRODUCTS p JOIN (SELECT PK, P_VERSION, P_CATALOG FROM HARP.CATALOGVERSIONS) cav ON p.P_CATALOGVERSION = cav.PK AND cav.P_VERSION = 'Online' JOIN (SELECT P_ID, PK FROM HARP.CATALOGS) ca ON cav.P_CATALOG = ca.PK AND ca.P_ID = 'harryrosenProductCatalog'
